dt: {bc}the management of a {a_link|house} and home affairs

dt.t: … coming home to husbands who won't share in the {wi}housekeeping{/wi} …

dt: {bc}the work or activity of cleaning and preparing rooms for customers (as in a hotel)

dt: {bc}the department or employees responsible for doing such work

dt: {bc}the care and management of property and the provision of equipment and services (as for an industrial organization)

dt.t: performing some computer {wi}housekeeping{/wi} by deleting old files

shortdef: the management of a house and home affairs
the work or activity of cleaning and preparing rooms for customers (as in a hotel) —often used before another noun; also : the department or employees responsible for doing such work
the care and management of property and the provision of equipment and services (as for an industrial organization)

dt: {bc}domestic work restricted to the less laborious duties

{bc}to bring or restore to normal health

{bc}to make carefully worked out plans for
{bc}to put in a compromising or dangerous position usually by trickery or deceit
{bc}to execute one or more plays in preparation for scoring
{bc}to come into active operation or use
